tooltip.syncac.general_regex:
This will be the regex used for finding the server TPS in the player list footer.
This will NOT work if the tps is in the header.
(NOTE: The MSPT field doesn't actually do anything. It's just there for in the future I might wanna add something)
tooltip.syncac.attack_interval: Sets the delay between attacks (in ticks)
tooltip.syncac.attack_sync: Synchronizes the delay between attacks with Carpet Mod Log TPS in the player list Footer, in case the server is lagging/slowed down
tooltip.syncac.use_interval: Sets the delay between uses (in ticks)
tooltip.syncac.use_sync: Synchronizes the delay between uses with Carpet Mod Log TPS in the player list Footer, in case the server is lagging/slowed down
